text: jug-eum-e ileun ingan-ui yeonghon-eul as-agamyeo sumyeon-ui sangtaelo hayeo saeng myeong-eul as-aganeun bun-eun hananim-isilagihan-i doen yeonghon-eul as-agamyeo gihan i ileuji anihan yeonghon-eul jamsi yuyehasineun bundo hananim-isila silloi an-eneun suggohaneun baegseongdeul-eul wi han gyohun-i issnola
